title: But It's Too Dangerous
description: ASIN B00UL1QO1M moved to the most recent edition hereThe moment Emily meets Anna, she falls for her. The problem is, Anna is married, and so is she. Can Emily and Anna be together? Will they save each other? “But It’s Too Dangerous”, is a heart-wrenching, emotional and realistic story about friendship, love, and desire.
author: S.B. Sheeran
